snippet: President Tayyip Erdogan responded to Berlin's criticism of Turkey's arrest of a German journalist by saying on Friday Deniz Yucel was a "German agent" and a member of a militant Kurdish armed group....

headline.main: How the Amazon’s Cashews and Cacao Point to Cultivation by the Ancients
headline.print_headline: How the Amazon’s Cashews and Cacao Point to Cultivation by the Ancients

lead_paragraph: President Tayyip Erdogan responded to Berlin's criticism of Turkey's arrest of a German journalist by saying on Friday Deniz Yucel was a "German agent" and a member of a militant Kurdish armed group.
